snippet.title: TAVERN TALK - Release Date Announcement!
snippet.description:
The draconic familiar is out of the bag! Tavern Talk is coming this June 20th! Get ready for biggest and coziest tavern adventure you have ever ventured on. 💜

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2076140/Tavern_Talk/

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/EshZWmcTDT

Directed by Tommaso Crogliano
Animation & Art by Nika Gorev & Clara Furtwängler
Edit by Tommaso Crogliano
Musik by Filippo Beck Peccoz: www.fbpsound.com 

Our Voice Actors:
Sarah Nightingale as the tavern owner: https://www.nightingale-voices.com/sarah
